pkgmetadata.longdescription: qimsys is is Qt based input method system for Linux. Currently Only Japanese input is supported. Supported input method engines are Anthy, SocialIME. Though it is written with Qt, it can be used for X11, gtk+, and of cource, Qt based applications.

use.flag: Enable support for x11-libs/gtk+:2 based application.
Enable support for x11-libs/gtk+:3 based application.
Use anthy support as input method engine
Use Social IME support as a input method engine
Use Google CGI API for Japanese Input support as a input method engine
